title: EV Charging vs Gas Costs Over 3 Years
text:
Summary Insights


Key Insights:


=============


- Best vehicle comparison: Honda Prologue vs Honda Passport 


- Average savings across all comparisons: $ 376 


- Analysis based on 13,500 miles per year over 3 years


- Green areas on maps indicate EV savings, red areas indicate gas is cheaper
